Description: Magical gem; intaglio; nicolo; oval; double-bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: hawk wearing crowns of Upper and Lower Egypt; chalice in front.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (19)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
